name: Blusukan
description:
"BLUSUKAN" is a Javanese language which means "Exploring hidden place of the town".

===========================================================

This game aims to unite us, as young people who are pursuing a passion in the game industry. Even though we won't be able to win, I hope we can become a Game Studio that is more advanced and innovative for future projects.

Best regards,

Seta Murdha Pamungkas, Founder of The Farmers Studio.
